options.name: Wyrd Stone
options.description: The bearer’s model gets Hard Target(2).

options.name: Icon of the Infinite
options.description: The bearer can cast Hellfire (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell(5+).

options.name: Wasteland Torch
options.description: The bearer's unit gains Strider (Ruins). During your Spell Selection (step 8 of the Pre-game Sequence), you may choose a single Field or Forest that becomes Ruins. The bearer's unit gains Flaming Attacks in the First Round of Combat.

options.name: Zealots' Banner
options.description: Models in the second rank of the bearer's unit gains Extra Support (2).

options.name: Burning Portent
options.description: Flaming Attacks, Multiple Wounds(D3), AP set to 10.

options.name: Symbol of Slaughter
options.description: +2 Att and +2 Agi.

options.name: Ledger of Souls
options.description: After removing a friendly model without Insignificant in a unit within 9" of the bearer's model due to enemy attacks, you gain one Magic Dice at the start of Siphon the Veil of your next Magic Phase. No more than 2 Magic Dice can be gained this way in a Magic Phase.

options.name: Immortal Gauntlets
options.description: At the start of any Round of Combat that the bearer is fighting, you may discard a stored Magic Dice. If so, choose either Divine Attacks, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks. The bearer's Melee Attacks gain the chosen Attack Attribute. The chosen effect lasts until the end of the phase.

options.name: Veilgate Orb
options.description: During Storing Magic, the player may store up to two magic dice.

options.name: Lord of the Damned
options.description: Friendly units with Irredeemable within 18" of the bearer, before rolling the Random Movement distance in the Movement Phase, may choose to apply either Minimised or Maximised to the roll.

options.name: Daemonic Wings
options.description: The bearer gains +3 Cha, +3 Mob, Fly,,Swiftstride.

options.name: Dark Prelate
options.description: The bearer can cast Danse Macabre (Evocation) and Chorus of the Damned (Evocation) as a Bound Spell(4+), which can only target the Caster's own unit.

options.name: Entropic Aura
options.description: Weapon Enchantments and Armour Enchantments carried by the bearer, models in the bearer's unit, and models in units that are in contact with the bearer are ignored.

options.name: Luck of the Dark Gods
options.description: The bearer's model gains Aegis(+1, max. 4+).

options.name: Idol of Spite
options.description: One use only. May be activated at the start of a Round of Combat. For the duration of that Round of Combat, the bearer gains +1 Att, +1 Str, and +1 AP.

options.name: Thrice-Forged
options.description: Arm set to 6.

options.name: Gladiator's Spirit
options.description: +1 Arm and Parry.

options.name: Envy
options.description: Charge Range and Pursue Distance rolls by units containing this Favour are Maximised.

options.name: Gluttony
options.description: The first time a model with this Favour is on the winning side of a combat, its model parts with Path of the Favoured gain +1 Str with Duration: Permanent.

options.name: Greed
options.description: The model part with Path of the Favoured gains Great Weapon, Halberd, Paired Weapons, and Weapon Master. A Chosen Lord with this Favour may take a second item from either the Artefacts category or the Potions and Scrolls category (but cannot take a second item from both categories).

options.name: Lust
options.description: The model gains Feigned Flight.

options.name: Pride
options.description: Courage Tests taken by units containing this Favour are Minimised. Command Tests taken by units containing this Favour are Maximised.

options.name: Sloth
options.description: The model gains +1 Res. When the model’s unit declares a Charge or performs a March Move, the effect is lost until the start of the Melee Phase in the next Player Turn.

options.name: Wrath
options.description: The model part with Path of the Favoured gains Frenzy, Fury, and Unruly.
